archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Close Service Performance Degradation Report
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Close a service performance degradation report when the service performance has been resolved Extended Description The objective of the Close Service Performance Degradation Report processes is to close a service performance degradation report when the service performance has been resolved. These processes monitor the status of all open service performance degradation reports, and recognize that a service performance degradation report is ready to be closed when the status is changed to cleared. Explanatory Reserved for future use. Mandatory Reserved for future use. Optional Reserved for future use. Interactions
